definition: no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom)/no good words are to be expected from a scoundrel
pinyin: gou3 zui3 li5 tu3 bu4 chu1 xiang4 ya2

sentences.english: He has been leading an ivory-tower existence.
sentences.chinese: 他可是一直過着象牙塔似的生活。

sentences.english: He sports an ivory-handled cane these days.
sentences.chinese: 這些天，他誇耀着他的鑲有象牙的手杖。

sentences.english: Ivory fruit is a kind of South America Ecuador palm trees coconut.
sentences.chinese: 象牙果是一種南美厄瓜多爾的棕櫚樹椰果。

sentences.english: It is like a pomegranate cut in twain with a knife of ivory.
sentences.chinese: 它像是用象牙刀切成兩半的石榴。

sentences.english: The table is inlaid with an ivory flower-pattern.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上嵌着象牙雕成的花。

sentences.english: He carved out a flower of ivory.
In turn scientists have retreated to their 'ivory towers', she said.
sentences.chinese: 她說，反過來，科學家退縮到了他們的“象牙塔”裏。

sentences.english: May I see that ivory horse?
sentences.chinese: 我可以看看那象牙制的馬嗎？

sentences.english: This was true in sixty-two percent of couples in Ivory Coast and Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在象牙海岸和肯尼亞62%的夫妻的情況確實是這樣。

sentences.english: Unlike Ivory Coast and Gambia, Mali has no seaports.
sentences.chinese: 與象牙海岸和岡比亞不同，馬裏沒有海港。

sentences.english: I am of fair complextion, and find that the blush ivory works well with my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我有一張白臉，發現粉象牙對我很適合。

sentences.english: I'd like a kitchen mostly in ivory and light green.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一間全是象牙色和淺綠色的廚房。

sentences.english: People hunt elephants mainly for their ivory tusks.
sentences.chinese: 人類捕殺大象主要是爲了獲取象牙。

sentences.english: You are really such a person.
sentences.chinese: 你這人真是“狗嘴裏長不出象牙。”

sentences.english: Can we get out of the glass tower?
sentences.chinese: 我們能跳出那個象牙塔嗎？

sentences.english: We must save the trees and not buy things made of ivory.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須拯救樹木，拒買象牙製品。

definition: Baiyü county (Tibetan: dpal yul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
